org.spongepowered.api.world.gen.populators

Interface IceSpike

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Populator

    public interface IceSpike
extends Populator
    Represents a populator which generates large spikes of Ice.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  IceSpike.Builder
      A builder for constructing IceSpike populators.

    • Method Detail

      • getBaseHeight

        int getBaseHeight()
        Gets the base height of the spike.
        Returns:
        The base height

      • setBaseHeight

        void setBaseHeight(int height)
        Sets the base height of the spike.
        Parameters:
        height - The new base height

      • getHeightVariance

        int getHeightVariance()
        Gets the height variance of the spike. The final height will be the base height plus a random amount between zero (inclusive) and the variance (exclusive).
        Returns:
        The height variance

      • setHeightVariance

        void setHeightVariance(int variance)
        Sets the height variance of the spike. The final height will be the base height plus a random amount between zero (inclusive) and the variance (exclusive).
        Parameters:
        variance - The new height variance

      • getExtremeSpikeChance

        int getExtremeSpikeChance()
        Gets the chance of the spike much larger than normal. The default value is 60 (therefore equating to a 1 in 60 chance).
        Returns:
        The spawn chance

      • setExtremeSpikeChance

        void setExtremeSpikeChance(int chance)
        Gets the chance of the spike much larger than normal. The default value is 60 (therefore equating to a 1 in 60 chance).
        Parameters:
        chance - The new spawn chance

      • getExtremeSpikeBaseIncrease

        int getExtremeSpikeBaseIncrease()
        Gets the base height increase of the extreme spikes.
        Returns:
        The base height increase

      • setExtremeSpikeBaseIncrease

        void setExtremeSpikeBaseIncrease(int increase)
        Sets the base height increase of the extreme spikes.
        Parameters:
        increase - The new base height increase

      • getExtremeSpikeIncreaseVariance

        int getExtremeSpikeIncreaseVariance()
        Gets the variance in the height increase of extreme spikes. The final increase will be the base increase plus a random amount between zero (inclusive) and the variance (exclusive).
        Returns:
        The increase variance

      • setExtremeSpikeIncreaseVariance

        void setExtremeSpikeIncreaseVariance(int variance)
        Sets the variance in the height increase of extreme spikes. The final increase will be the base increase plus a random amount between zero (inclusive) and the variance (exclusive).
        Parameters:
        variance - The new increase variance
